svg.text: Merge Sort - Divide and Conquer Algorithm

g.text: 1. Divide: Split array into two halves recursively until single elements
2. Conquer: Merge sorted subarrays back together in sorted order
3. Time Complexity: O(n log n) - guaranteed for all cases
Time: O(n log n), Space: O(n)
while i < len(left) and j < len(right):
• O(n) - requires additional space for temporary arrays
• Guaranteed O(n log n) performance • Stable sorting algorithm
